      • deleteFileFromTrash

        public SuccessResult deleteFileFromTrash(long fileId)
                                  throws YfyException
        Permanently delete a specific file that is in the trash. The file will no longer exist in fangcloud. This action cannot be undone.
        Parameters:
        fileId - File id in fangcloud
        Returns:
        An object only has one attribute named success
        Throws:
        YfyException

      • restoreFileFromTrash

        public SuccessResult restoreFileFromTrash(long fileId)
                                   throws YfyException
        Restore a file that has been moved to the trash. Default behavior is to restore the file to the folder it was in before it was moved to the trash
        Parameters:
        fileId - File id in fangcloud
        Returns:
        An object only has one attribute named success
        Throws:
        YfyException

        public String preSignatureDownload(long fileId)
                            throws YfyException
        Get file download url, then use the url to download file. The url is valid in an hour
        Parameters:
        fileId - File id in fangcloud
        Returns:
        Download url of the file

      • preSignatureUpload

        public String preSignatureUpload(long parentId,
                        String name)
                          throws YfyException
        Get the file upload url, then use the url to upload file. The url is valid in an hour and can only be used for one time
        Parameters:
        parentId - Parent folder id you want to store the file in, the root folder is 0
        name - File name
        Returns:
        Upload url of the file
        Throws:
        YfyException

      • newVersionPreSignatureUpload

        public String newVersionPreSignatureUpload(long fileId,
                                  String name,
                                  String remark)
                                    throws YfyException
        Get the new version file upload url, then use the url to upload new version file. The url is valid in an hour and can only be used for one time
        Parameters:
        fileId - Origin file id in fangcloud
        name - File name of the new version
        remark - remark of the new version
        Returns:
        An object contains a attribute named upload url
        Throws:
        YfyException

      • uploadFile

        public YfyFile uploadFile(String uploadUrl,
                 String filePath)
                   throws YfyException,
                          FileNotFoundException
        When get a file upload url, use this method to upload the file to the server (note that real file name used name in pre signature arg)
        Parameters:
        uploadUrl - Upload url returned by the this#preSignatureUpload(long,String)
        filePath - Path of the file which you'd like to upload to server
        Returns:
        Detailed new file information
        Throws:
        YfyException
        FileNotFoundException

                 String filePath,
                 long fileSize,
                 YfyProgressListener progressListener)
                   throws YfyException,
                          FileNotFoundException
        When get a file upload url, use this method to upload the file to the server (note that real file name used name in pre signature arg)
        Parameters:
        uploadUrl - Upload url returned by the this#preSignatureUpload(long,String)
        filePath - Path of the file which you'd like to upload to server
        fileSize - The size of file
        progressListener - Where get file upload progress
        Returns:
        Detailed new file information
        Throws:
        YfyException
        FileNotFoundException

      • getPreviewUrl

        public String getPreviewUrl(long fileId,
                   int period)
                     throws YfyException
        get file's preview url
        Parameters:
        fileId - File id in fangcloud
        period - expire in seconds, should be between 300 to 7200
        Returns:
        file's preview url
        Throws:
